title: Drawing, "Design for a Monument to a Cardinal", after 1720
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream laid paper
creditline: Gift of Dorothy Warren in honor of Richard Wunder
description:
Standing figure of an ecclesiastic, possibly a cardinal or other official of the Church, holding a cross and palm frond. Figure is placed on an ovoid pedestal decorated with swags. 
Inscriprion with date below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Monument to a Cardinal", after 1720.
after 1720. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over black chalk on cream laid paper. Gift of Dorothy Warren in honor of Richard Wunder. 2006-34-1.
